messages.subject: samurai honor in society
messages.msgSnippet: im doing some research and have to verify and assess the following statement if, a samurai s position in the privileged class of society was well deserved as
messages.messageBody:
im doing some research and have to verify and assess the following
statement if, a samurai's position in the privileged class of
society was well deserved as he was the protector of the lands and
people.

I need some help , so can u please show me some sites or give me a
certain sort of idea.

thanx
